mapper.select: select t.id, t.towerName, t.towerType, t.towerAddress, t.installDate, t.runDate, l.id, l.lineName, l.companyName, l.voltageGrade, l.beginLine, l.endLine, l.towerNumber from tower t, line l where t.line_id = l.id limit #{startPage}, #{maxPage}
select t.id, l.lineName, t.towerName from tower t, line l where t.line_id = l.id

select t.id, t.towerName, t.towerType, t.towerAddress, t.installDate, t.runDate, l.id, l.lineName, l.companyName, l.voltageGrade, l.beginLine, l.endLine, l.towerNumber from tower t, line l where t.line_id = l.id and t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tower(towerName, towerType, towerAddress, installDate, runDate,line_id) values ( #{towerName}, #{towerType}, #{towerAddress}, #{installDate},#{runDate}, #{line_id.id})
mapper.update: update tower set towerName = #{towerName}, towerType = #{towerType}, towerAddress = #{towerAddress}, installDate = #{installDate}, runDate = #{runDate}, line_id = #{line_id.id} where id = #{id}
